thread.title: Product Manager - Core Game - Sports Management
thread.title_full: Product Manager - Core Game - Sports Management

title: Product Manager - Core Game - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: Manage and improve the core product experience for our users while progressing the strategic goals of the business.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
